name: get-cardorders-id-items
description: Returns the item list of a specific card order.

id.description: The unique identifier of the card order.

offset.description:
Specifies the position of an element in a list of card orders. The response includes a list of card order items that starts at the specified offset.

**Default:** 0, which means that the response contains all the elements in the list of card order items.

limit.description: The number of card order items returned per page. **Default:** 10.

$ul: **data**: List of card order items in the card order batch.
**hasNext**: Indicates whether there are more items on the next page.
**hasPrevious**: Indicates whether there are more items on the previous page.
